page.title: 11Principal Buildings (Melin)
page.content: Along the main road which is Neath Road the first place you come to is an Esso Garage.Across the road you will find the Melin Junior School which at the moment is being built.A little further on you have the Eaglesbush Public House.On the opposite side of the road is Wilmot Construction.Walk along the road and you will come to the Royal Exchange pub.Further down is the Melin Social Club.On the opposite side of the road is Melin Post Office.Near to the Post Office is Neath Boys Club.Near this is Lorenzo's Hairdressers.Towards Neath there are a few more public houses.Next there is a Chinese take-away food shop and then around the corner is a launderette. There is a large chapel at the end of the road at Stockham's Corner.
